AdvUnitShading.description: Determines whether specular highlights and other lighting effects are rendered for units.

AllowDeferredMapRendering.description: Enable rendering the map to the map deferred buffers.

AllowDeferredModelRendering.description: Allows the rendering of model deferred buffers.

AllowMultiSampledFrameBuffers.description: Enable FBOs that can have multisampled anti-aliasing.

AllowSpectatorJoin.description: allow any unauthenticated clients to join as spectator with any name, name will be prefixed with ~

AnimationMT.description: Enable multithreaded execution of animation ticks

AtiHacks.description:
Enables graphics drivers workarounds for users with AMD proprietary drivers.
 -1:=runtime detect, 0:=off, 1:=on

AutoAddBuiltUnitsToFactoryGroup.description: Controls whether or not units built by factories will inherit that factory's unit group.

AutohostPort.description: Which port should the engine listen on for Autohost interfact connections.

BlockCompositing.description: Disables kwin compositing to fix tearing, possible fixes low FPS in windowed mode, too.

BumpWaterEndlessOcean.description: Sets whether Bumpmapped water will be drawn beyond the map edge.

BumpWaterReflection.description:
Determines the amount of objects reflected in Bumpmapped water.
0:=off, 1:=fast (skip terrain), 2:=full

BumpWaterRefraction.description:
Determines the method of refraction with Bumpmapped water.
0:=off, 1:=screencopy, 2:=own rendering cycle (disabled)

BumpWaterTexSizeReflection.description: Sets the size of the framebuffer texture used to store the reflection in Bumpmapped water.

CamFrameTimeCorrection.description: Sets wether the camera interpolation factor should be the inverse of fps or last draw frame time (0 = lastdrawframetime, 1 = fpsinv)

CamFreeAutoTilt.description: When free camera is locked, AutoTilt will point the camera in the direction of the ground's slope

CamFreeGravity.description: When free camera is locked, Gravity will be used if you jump off of a ground ramp.

CamFreeGroundOffset.description:
Determines ground handling for the free camera.
0 - the camera can move anywhere,
< 0 - the camera is always offset from the ground height by -CamFreeGroundOffset
> 0 - the camera can be "locked" to the ground by using SHIFT UP_ARROW. (and will use CamFreeGroundOffset as the offset). To release the lock, simply press SHIFT DOWN_ARROW.

CamMode.description:
Defines the used camera. Options are:
0 = FPS
1 = Overhead
2 = Spring
3 = RotOverhead
4 = Free
5 = Overview

CamOverviewDynamicRotation.description: Transition from different camera preserves rotation

CamSpringEdgeRotate.description: Rotate camera when cursor touches screen borders.

CamSpringFastScaleMouseMove.description: Scaling for CameraMoveFastMult in spring camera mode while moving mouse.

CamSpringFastScaleMousewheelMove.description: Scaling for CameraMoveFastMult in spring camera mode while scrolling with mouse.

CamSpringHalflife.description: For Spring Dampened camera. It is the time in milliseconds at which the camera should be approximately halfway towards the goal.

CamSpringLockCardinalDirections.description: Whether cardinal directions should be `locked` for a short time when rotating.

CamSpringMinZoomDistance.description: Minimum camera zoom distance, note this is the distance from frustrum location to the ground in the direction of view

CamSpringTrackMapHeightMode.description: Camera height is influenced by terrain height. 0=Static 1=Terrain 2=Smoothmesh

CamTimeExponent.description: Camera transitions happen at lerp(old, new, timeNorm ^ CamTimeExponent).

CamTimeFactor.description: Scales the speed of camera transitions, e.g. zooming or position change.

CamTransitionMode.description:
Defines the function used for camera transitions. Options are:
0 = Exponential Decay
1 = Spring Dampened
2 = Spring Dampened with timed transitions
3 = Lerp Smoothed

CameraMoveFastMult.description: The multiplier applied to speed when camera is in movefast state.

CameraMoveSlowMult.description: The multiplier applied to speed when camera is in moveslow state.

ColorElev.description: If heightmap (default hotkey [F1]) should be colored or not.

CompressTextures.description: Runtime compress most textures to save VideoRAM.

CubeTexGenerateMipMaps.description: Generate mipmaps for the reflection and specular cubemap textures, useful for efficient subsampling and blurring.

CubeTexSizeReflection.description: The square resolution of each face of the environment reflection cubemap.

CubeTexSizeSpecular.description: The square resolution of each face of the specular cubemap.

DebugGL.description: Enables GL debug-context and output. (see GL_ARB_debug_output)

DebugGLStacktraces.description: Create a stacktrace when an OpenGL error occurs

DefaultLuaMenu.description: Sets the default menu to be used when spring is started.

DefaultStartScript.description: filename of script.txt to use when no command line parameters are specified.

DemoFromDemo.description: Enable recording a demo while playing back a demo.

DisableDemoVersionCheck.description: Allow to play every replay file (may crash / cause undefined behaviour in replays)

DualScreenMiniMapAspectRatio.description: Whether minimap preserves aspect ratio on dual screen mode.

DualScreenMiniMapOnLeft.description: When set, will make the left half of the screen the minimap when DualScreenMode is set.

DualScreenMode.description: Sets whether to split the screen in half, with one half for minimap and one for main screen. Right side is for minimap unless DualScreenMiniMapOnLeft is set.

DumpGameStateOnDesync.description: Enable writing clientgamestate and servergamestate dumps when a desync is detected

EdgeMoveDynamic.description: If EdgeMove scrolling speed should fade with edge distance.

EdgeMoveWidth.description: The width (in percent of screen size) of the EdgeMove scrolling area.

ExtraTextureUpdateRate.description: EXTREME CPU-HEAVY ON MEDIUM/BIG MAPS! DON'T CHANGE DEFAULT!

FeatureDrawDistance.description: Maximum distance at which features will be drawn.

FeatureFadeDistance.description: Distance at which features will begin to fade from view.

FontFile.description: Sets the font of Spring engine text.

FontOutlineWeight.description: Sets the opacity of Spring engine text, such as the title screen version number, clock, and basic UI. Does not affect LuaUI elements.

FontOutlineWidth.description: Sets the width of the black outline around Spring engine text, such as the title screen version number, clock, and basic UI. Does not affect LuaUI elements.

FontSize.description: Sets the font size (in pixels) of the MainMenu and more.

Fullscreen.description: Sets whether the game will run in fullscreen, as opposed to a window. For Windowed Fullscreen of Borderless Window, set this to 0, WindowBorderless to 1, and WindowPosX and WindowPosY to 0.

FullscreenEdgeMove.description: see WindowedEdgeMove, just for fullscreen mode

GrassDetail.description: Sets how detailed the engine rendered grass will be on any given map.

GroundDecals.description: Controls whether ground decals underneath buildings, unit tracks & footprints as well as ground scars from explosions will be rendered.

GroundDetail.description: Controls how detailed the map geometry will be. On lowered settings, cliffs may appear to be jagged or "melting".

GuiOpacity.description: Sets the opacity of the built-in Spring UI. Generally has no effect on LuaUI widgets. Can be set in-game using shift+, to decrease and shift+. to increase.

HangTimeout.description: Number of seconds that, if spent in the same code segment, indicate a hang; -1 to disable.

HardwareCursor.description: Sets hardware mouse cursor rendering. If you have a low framerate, your mouse cursor will seem "laggy". Setting hardware cursor will render the mouse cursor separately from spring and the mouse will behave normally. Note, not all GPU drivers support it in fullscreen mode!

HighQualityDecals.description: Forces MSAA processing of decals. Improves decals quality, but may ruin the performance.

HighResInfoTexture.description: Use full heightmap resolution info texture (true), or half resolution (false)

HighResLos.description: Controls whether LOS ("L view") edges are rendered in high resolution. Resource heavy!

HostIPDefault.description: Default IP to use for hosting if not specified in script.txt

HostPortDefault.description: Default Port to use for hosting if not specified in script.txt

InfoMessageTime.description: Time until old messages disappear from the ingame console.

InitialNetworkTimeout.description: Time to wait for the initial connection to the game server.

KeyChainTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds waiting for a key chain shortcut.

LastSelectedSetting.description: Stores the previously selected setting, when editing settings within the Spring main menu.

LoadingMT.description: Experimental option to load the game in separate thread. Expect visual glitches, crashes and deadlocks

LogFlushLevel.description: Flush the logfile when a message's level exceeds this value. ERROR is flushed by default, WARNING is not.

LogRepeatLimit.description: Allow at most this many consecutive identical messages to be logged.

LogSections.description: Comma-separated list of enabled logsections, see infolog.txt / console output for possible values.

LuaGarbageCollectionMemLoadMult.description: How much the amount of Lua memory in use increases the rate of garbage collection.

LuaGarbageCollectionRunTimeMult.description: How many milliseconds the garbage collected can run for in each GC cycle

LuaSocketEnabled.description: Enable LuaSocket support, allows Lua widgets to make TCP/UDP connections

MSAALevel.description: Enables multisample anti-aliasing; 'level' is the number of samples used.

MapBorder.description: Draws a solid border at the edges of the map.

MaxDynamicMapLights.description: Maximum number of map-global dynamic lights that will be rendered at once. High numbers of lights cost performance, as they affect every map fragment.

MaxFontTries.description: Represents the maximum number of attempts to search for a glyph replacement using the FontConfig library (lower = foreign glyphs may fail to render, higher = searching for foreign glyphs can lag the game).

MaxTextureAtlasSizeX.description: The max X size of the projectile and Lua texture atlasses

MaxTextureAtlasSizeY.description: The max Y size of the projectile and Lua texture atlasses

MenuArchive.description: Archive name for the default Menu.

MinDrawFPS.description: Defines how many frames per second should minimally be rendered. To reach this number we will delay simframes.

MinSampleShadingRate.description: A value of 1.0 indicates that each sample in the framebuffer should be independently shaded. A value of 0.0 effectively allows the GL to ignore sample rate shading. Any value between 0.0 and 1.0 allows the GL to shade only a subset of the total samples within each covered fragment.

MinSimDrawBalance.description: Percent of the time for simulation is minimum spend for drawing. E.g. if set to 0.15 then 15% of the total cpu time is exclusively reserved for drawing.

MiniMapCanDraw.description: Enables drawing with cursor over MiniMap.

MiniMapCanFlip.description: Whether minimap inverts coordinates when camera Y rotation is between 90 and 270 degrees.

MiniMapMouseWheel.description: Whether MiniMap responds to MouseWheel events

MiniMapRefreshRate.description: The refresh rate of the async MiniMap texture. Needs MiniMapRenderToTexture to be true. Value of "0" autoselects between 10-60FPS.

MiniMapRenderToTexture.description: Asynchronous render MiniMap to a texture independent of screen FPS.

MinimizeOnFocusLoss.description: When set to 1 minimize Window if it loses key focus when in fullscreen mode.

MouseDragBoxCommandThreshold.description: Distance in pixels which the mouse must be dragged to trigger a rectangular area command.

MouseDragCircleCommandThreshold.description: Distance in pixels which the mouse must be dragged to trigger a circular area command.

MouseDragFrontCommandThreshold.description: Distance in pixels which the mouse must be dragged to trigger a formation front command.

MouseDragSelectionThreshold.description: Distance in pixels which the mouse must be dragged to trigger a selection box.

NetworkTimeout.description: Number of seconds before connection to game server is considered lost.

OverheadMaxHeightFactor.description: Float multiplier for maximum overhead camera zoom distance

PitchAdjust.description: Adjusts sound pitch proportional to [if set to 1, the square root of] game speed. Set to 2 for linear scaling.

PreloadModels.description: The engine will preload all models

ROAM.description: Use ROAM for terrain mesh rendering: 0 to disable, 1=VBO mode to enable.

RapidTagResolutionOrder.description: ';' separated list of domains, preference order for resolving package from rapid tags

RotateLogFiles.description: Rotate logfiles, old logfiles will be moved into the subfolder "log".

SMFTextureLodBias.description: In case SMFTextureStreaming = false, this parameter controls the sampling lod bias applied to diffuse texture

SMFTextureStreaming.description: Dynamically load and unload SMF Diffuse textures. Saves VRAM, worse performance and image quality.

ScreenshotCounter.description: Deprecated, does nothing, but not marked as such to keep compatibility with older engine versions

SelectThroughGround.description: How far beyond the ground to allow selecting objects.

ServerSleepTime.description: Number of milliseconds to sleep per tick for the server thread. Lower values have marginally higher CPU load, while high values can introduce additional latency.

SetCoreAffinity.description: Defines a bitmask indicating which CPU cores the main-thread should use.

ShadowColorMode.description: Whether the colorbuffer of shadowmap FBO is RGB vs greyscale(to conserve some VRAM)

ShadowMapSize.description: Sets the resolution of shadows. Higher numbers increase quality at the cost of performance.

Shadows.description:
Sets whether shadows are rendered.
-1:=forceoff, 0:=off, 1:=full, 2:=fast (skip terrain)

ShowClock.description: Displays a clock on the top-right corner of the screen showing the elapsed time of the current game.

SmallFontFile.description: Sets the font of Spring engine small text.

SmallFontSize.description: Sets the font size (in pixels) of the engine GUIs and more.

SmoothTimeOffset.description: Enables frametimeoffset smoothing, 0 = off (old version), -1 = forced 0.5,  1-20 smooth, recommended = 2-3

SoftParticles.description: Soften up CEG particles on clipping edges

SpeedControl.description: Sets how server adjusts speed according to player's load (CPU), 1: use average, 2: use highest

SpringData.description: List of additional data-directories, separated by ';' on Windows and ':' on other OSs

SpringDataRoot.description: Optional custom data-directory content root ('base', 'maps', ...) to scan for archives

StoreDefaultSettings.description: springsettings.cfg will save the settings values, if they match the implicit defaults and were set by a user explicitly

TextureMemPoolSize.description: Set to 0 to disable, otherwise specify a predefined memory to serve Bitmap allocation requests

UnitIconsAsUI.description: Draw unit icons like it is an UI element and not like unit's LOD.

UnitIconsHideWithUI.description: Hide unit icons when UI is hidden.

UpdateBoundingVolumeMT.description: Enable multithreaded update of unit bounding volumes

UpdateWeaponVectorsMT.description: Enable multithreaded update of weapon vectors

UseFontConfigLib.description: Whether the system fontconfig library (if present and enabled at compile-time) should be used for handling fonts.

UseHighResTimer.description: On Windows, sets whether Spring will use low- or high-resolution timer functions for tasks like graphical interpolation between game frames.

UseLuaMemPools.description: Whether Lua VM memory allocations are made from pools.

UseNetMessageSmoothingBuffer.description: Buffer network packets for a few frames in an attempt to reduce lag from packet time variance. Introduces a fixed lag.

UseSDLAudio.description: If enabled, OpenAL-soft only renders audio into a SDL buffer and playback is done by the SDL audio layer, i.e. SDL handles the hardware

UseShaderCache.description: If already compiled shaders should be shared via a cache, reducing compiles of already compiled shaders.

VSync.description: Synchronize buffer swaps with vertical blanking interval. Modes are -N (adaptive), +N (standard), or 0 (disabled).

Water.description: Defines the type of water rendering. Can be set in game. Options are: 0 = Basic water, 1 = Reflective water, 2 = Reflective and Refractive water, 3 = Dynamic water, 4 = Bumpmapped water

WindowBorderless.description: When set and Fullscreen is 0, will put the game in Borderless Window mode, also known as Windowed Fullscreen. When using this, it is generally best to also set WindowPosX and WindowPosY to 0

WindowPosX.description: Sets the horizontal position of the game window, if Fullscreen is 0. When WindowBorderless is set, this should usually be 0.

WindowPosY.description: Sets the vertical position of the game window, if Fullscreen is 0. When WindowBorderless is set, this should usually be 0.

WindowedEdgeMove.description: Sets whether moving the mouse cursor to the screen edge will move the camera across the map.

WorkerThreadCount.description: Number of workers (including the main thread!) used by ThreadPool.

XResolution.description: Sets the width of the game screen. If set to 0 Spring will autodetect the current resolution of your desktop.

YResolution.description: Sets the height of the game screen. If set to 0 Spring will autodetect the current resolution of your desktop.

address.description: Last Ip/hostname used as direct connect in the menu.

name.description: Sets your name in the game. Since this is overridden by lobbies with your lobby username when playing, it usually only comes up when viewing replays or starting the engine directly for testing purposes.

snd_device.description: Sets the used output device. See "Available Devices" section in infolog.txt.
